entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
